group_1.textRight: I'm here too!
Good afternoon, Iroha.

group_1.textLeft: Hello to you too, Touka and Nemu.
Hmm?@Didn't you guys leave before me?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, Felicia and I left around the same time but...

group_1.textLeft: Were you guys playing far from here?

group_1.textRight: We weren't playing.@We went to my hospital.
The three of us hadn't visited since being discharged.
We updated the doctors and nurses who'd taken @care of us back then on all the latest news.
That's right.

group_1.textLeft: Oh right,@I think you mentioned something about that before.
So, what did you talk about?

group_1.textRight: Let's see...
We told them about going to visit all the places @on that map we made back then.
And I talked about Iroha and the friends I've made.
They were far more pleased to hear @from us than I would've imagined.
After that we talked about my web novels.
I was really moved when I heard they @were still reading them.

group_1.textLeft: What did you talk about, Touka?

group_1.textRight: I've got a story to tell concerning my task with @"connecting the universes".
It's impossible to get wormholes to a practical level.
I tried various things,@[chara:100701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100701:cheek_0][chara:100701:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_400][chara:100701:lipSynch_1]but none of them seemed to work.

group_1.textLeft: The conversation just became impossible to follow.

group_1.textRight: That's because you're all stupid.

group_1.textLeft: You said before that you verified a connection @to another universe, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: That's right!
While it's one thing to observe the negative mass,@trying to utilize it however...
That's just a dream.

group_1.textLeft: But if it succeeds, you'll be closer to achieving @"everyone's ideal", right?

group_1.textRight: Of course.
There's a possibility of expanding the Automatic @Purification System to cover the whole world!

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@I went to Kamihama believing that@Touka and Nemu were the key.
―Iroha―@Even now, it feels like a dream@to see the three of them lined up together.
―Iroha―@I was so worried that Ui@was just a mistake in my memories.
―Yachiyo―@What's more, Touka and Nemu@will help us fight to the end@to enact our proposition of no longer becoming Witches.
―Yachiyo―@Certainly, when I think about the past,@I want to really get a feel for the reality@that the three of them are together now.
―Yachiyo―@What the two of them tried to accomplish was wrong,@but their purpose wasn't.
―Iroha―@I think we're taking over that purpose now.
―Yachiyo―@Going forward,@I really hope we can do it@peacefully this time...
